title: The Emperor’s Consort: The Peerless Doctor - Novel Updates
author: Ah Cai   阿彩
description: She was an orphan who had been abandoned by her family, while he was the imperial grandson who was shrouded by trickery and hatred.  A Cixi celebration exposed her peerless magnificence and sealed their cursed fates.  Just for her, he created a road made of silk, making her renowned for her brilliance.  For him, she engaged in intrigue, helping him on the way to the throne.  And yet, in the end, she did not get the Empress’ seat.  Fine!  Since she had been abandoned by the world’s most esteemed man, she will just snatch his power, ruin his future and turn this entire world upside down!  >
